titleInfo.title: Title from envelope: __Formal Portrait of Joseph Goldfain Family

physicalDescription.extent: 1 item (photograph), 9.5 x 8 inches, black and white
physicalDescription.note: Stamped on front of photograph: ''? Corner of 15th and Lawrence Sts.'' Handwritten on back of photograph: ''Goldfain Family c. 1900, Joseph Sam.''

mods.abstract: Studio portrait of East European Jewish immigrants Joseph and Nettie Goldfain and their children shows the family in Denver, Colorado with Joseph holding a Yiddish newspaper printed in America. Pictured from left to right are (first row) Rose, Joseph, and Ephraim Goldfain; (second row) George, Samuel, and Nettie Goldfain.
mods.note: Appears in ''Images of America: Jewish Denver 1859-1940,'' by Dr. Jeanne Abrams, page 95.

titleInfo.title: Beck Archives Photograph Collection, Families and Groups
